sources.title: Edge Of Fear | Full Movie | Action Crime Thriller | Free Action Movie
sources.description:
Patrick Chen (Shen Lin) and his wife (Zhu Zhu) are enjoying a weekend vacation with their friend in his remote cabin when a posse of sociopathic killers, led by Jack (Robert Patrick), invade the house. The men kill Patrickâ€™s friend and stab Patrick in the heart, leaving him for dead.However, Patrick survives the attack and, as a trained doctor, knows that if he pulls the knife out of his heart, he will die instantly. His only chance of survival is to leave the knife in and attempt the impossible â€“ save his wife from the killers before he bleeds to death.

2018 | Stars: Rockmond Dunbar, Zhu Zhu, Shen Lin

metadata.Plot: After being stabbed in the heart by ruthless home invaders, a man is left for dead. Now weak, outnumbered, and knife sticking from his chest, he attempts to do the impossible: save his wife from these murderers before he bleeds to death.
metadata.Writer: Scott Barkan, Gregg Zehentner, Daxing Zhang
metadata.Actors: Rockmond Dunbar, Zhu Zhu, Shen Lin
